javax.microedition.media

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.microedition.media.Manager

  • public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    The Manager class provides methods to create and manage media players. It supports various audio content types and protocols.

                                  java.lang.String type)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  MediaException
        Creates a Player instance for the given sound and type.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound source
        type - the type of the sound
        Returns:
        a Player instance
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        MediaException - if a media error occurs

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getSupportedContentTypes

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getSupportedProtocols

        Returns:

      • getIsLocator

        public static boolean getIsLocator()
        Returns whether the current player was created with a locator.
        Returns:
        true if the player was created with a locator, false otherwise
